00050 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_Exists_when_file_exists()
00051 {
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( FileUtils::Exists(TEST_FILE) == true );
00053 }
00054 
00055 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_Exists_when_file_does_not_exist()
00056 {
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( FileUtils::Exists(TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE) == false );
00058 }

00060 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_LockFile_success()
00061 {
00062         const char *fileName = TEST_FILE;
00063         bool status = FileUtils::LockFile(fileName);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == true );
00065         status = FileUtils::UnlockFile(fileName);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == true );
00067 }
00068 
00069 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_LockFile_double_lock_failure()
00070 {
00071         const char *fileName = TEST_FILE;
00072         bool status = FileUtils::LockFile(fileName);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == true );
00074         status = FileUtils::LockFile(fileName);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == false );
00076         status = FileUtils::UnlockFile(fileName);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == true );
00078 }
00079 
00080 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_LockFile_file_does_not_exist()
00081 {
00082         const char *fileName = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00083         bool status = FileUtils::LockFile(fileName);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == false );
00085 }

00087 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_UnlockFile_file_does_not_exist()
00088 {
00089         const char *fileName = TEST_NON_EXISTANT_FILE;
00090         bool status = FileUtils::UnlockFile(fileName);
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( status == true );
00092 }
00093 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_ListFiles()
00094 {
00095         const char *path = "../data";
00096         list<string> files;
00097         list<string>::iterator it;
00098         string file;
00099     string filesarray[3];
00100 
00101         files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "a");
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 3 );
00103     filesarray[0] = "";
00104     filesarray[1] = "";
00105     filesarray[2] = "";
00106         for (it = files.begin(); it!= files.end(); ++it)
00107     {
00108         file = *it;
00109         if (file == "../data/file1.a")
00110             filesarray[0] = file;
00111 
00112         else if (file == "../data/file2.a")
00113             filesarray[1] = file;
00114 
00115         else if (file == "../data/file3.a")
00116             filesarray[2] = file;
00117     }
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( filesarray[0] == "../data/file1.a" );
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( filesarray[1] == "../data/file2.a" );
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( filesarray[2] == "../data/file3.a" );
00121 
00122 
00123         files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "b");
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 2 );    
00125     filesarray[0] = "";
00126     filesarray[1] = "";
00127         for (it = files.begin(); it!= files.end(); ++it)
00128     {
00129         file = *it;
00130         if (file == "../data/file1.b")
00131             filesarray[0] = file;
00132 
00133         else if (file == "../data/file2.b")
00134             filesarray[1] = file;
00135     }
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( filesarray[0] == "../data/file1.b" );
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( filesarray[1] == "../data/file2.b" );
00138 
00139 
00140         files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "c");
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 1 );
00142         it = files.begin();
00143         file = *it;
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( file == "../data/file1.c" );
00145         ++it;
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( it == files.end() );
00147 
00148         files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "d");
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 0 );
00150 
00151         files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "");
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 6 );
00153 }
00154 
00155 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_ListFiles_path_does_not_exist()
00156 {
00157         const char *path = "../path_does_not_exist";
00158         list<string> files = FileUtils::ListFiles(path, "a");
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( files.size() == 0 );
00160 }

00162 void FileUtilsTest::testmethod_RemoveFile()
00163 {
00164         const char *fname = "./remove_file";
00165         ofstream o(fname, ios::out);
00166         o << "test" << endl;
00167         o.close();
00168 
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(FileUtils::Exists(fname) == true);
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(FileUtils::RemoveFile(fname) == true);
00171         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(FileUtils::Exists(fname) == false);
00172 }
